title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“ 'It's hard to get medical aid if you're HIV-infected in many areas.' ” [A quotation from Dr. Richard J. Howard from The New York Times, 11 November 1990. Submitted by Ron Tyler, Didsbury, Alberta.]
